title: 怎么装Mod
author: moneyho9
txt_content: 我的版本是minecraftSP版的，系统是XP

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5431-1-1.html 图文还有声音视频 就差我插入病毒帮你们自动装了

置顶帖子是拿来吃的么？

采纳谢谢

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: 打开.minecraft，打开bin，打开minecraft.jar，删除大写的META，把modloader拖进去，再把你要的mod拖进去

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
看這裡, MOD區的置頂教學, 有圖有文
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5431-1-1.html

replies.author: 路邊電燈泡
replies.txt_content: GB版主不是有發安裝MOD的帖子嗎...而且還置頂= =
